api_list.name: Search Item
Get All Categories
api_list.description: Getting all parents and sub categories
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://mercari.p.rapidapi.com/Mercari/GetAllCategories"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mercari.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://mercari.p.rapidapi.com/Mercari/GetAllCategories"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mercari.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Item Information
api_list.description:
Get an item information by item id.
item id starts with a letter "m" which is show on URL.
for example:
https://www.mercari.com/us/item/m87613775748

m87613775748 is the item id you are looking for.

api_list.name: Get Seller Information
api_list.description:
Get a seller information by seller id.
Seller id is a bunch of number which is show on URL.
for example:
https://www.mercari.com/u/589609090

589609090 is the seller id you are looking for.

api_list.name: Get Parent Category
api_list.description: get a parent category of a sub category  by id

api_list.name: Get Sub Categories
api_list.description: get all sub categories by parent category id

api_list.name: Get Seller's Items
api_list.description: Get seller's items by seller id

api_list.name: Get Urls By Search
api_list.description: get the urls of all the items by searching the specific keyword.
